EINSTEIN GENERATIVE AI
Prompt Builder

Simplify your users’ daily tasks by integrating generative-AI moments powered by prompt templates into their workflow. Create, test, revise, customize, and manage prompt templates that incorporate your CRM data from merge fields that reference record fields, flows, related lists, and Apex. Prompt Builder helps you to make effective prompts that safely connect you and your data with LLMs.

Create different types of prompt templates in Prompt Builder.

A Sales Email prompt template helps your sales team to draft personalized emails for a contact or a lead.
A Field Generation prompt template brings generative AI-assisted workflows to fields within Lightning record pages. Enable your users to populate a field with a summary or description created by an LLM to facilitate more productive conversations with your customers.
A Flex prompt template takes a variable number of inputs of different object types. This flexibility opens up a wide array of possibilities, such as generating a newsletter based on product and campaign objects.

Call a prompt template through an invocable action anywhere on the Salesforce Platform or by using the Connect REST API or Connect in Apex.

Assign the Prompt Template Manager permission set to Salesforce admins who create and manage prompt templates in Prompt Builder.

Get to Know Prompt Builder
Explore the Prompt Builder UI and understand prompts and prompt templates.
Manage Prompt Templates
Fine-tune your prompt template in Prompt Builder by using versions, activation and deactivation, changing LLM configurations, and more.
Create a Prompt Template
Select the type of prompt template to create based on your use case. Based on the template type, define the resources available for the template.
Create a Sales Email Prompt Template
Want to connect with customers using emails that leverage your customer relationship history and insights? To generate personalized, targeted emails at scale, design a sales email prompt template. Because you can reuse your template for different products and customers, getting an LLM to write your emails saves you time and makes email workflows easier.
Create a Field Generation Prompt Template
A Field Generation prompt template brings generative AI-assisted workflows to fields within Lightning record pages. Enable your users to populate a field with a summary or description created by an LLM to facilitate more productive conversations with your customers.
Create a Flex Prompt Template
For any use case that isn’t covered by the other template types, a flex prompt template type is your solution. Craft a flex prompt template that uses AI to generate content for your unique business cases.
Review, Revise, and Repeat: Ensure That a Prompt Template Is Effective
Generative AI uses LLMs to generate output. Because LLMs are trained by other organizations, it’s common to first receive an LLM response that isn’t quite right, even if the prompt seems clear. If the output doesn’t meet your expectations, you can generate a new output by revising your prompt template. The generated output from the previous attempt isn’t saved, and the new output replaces it. With Prompt Builder, it’s easy to edit your prompt template until you’re completely satisfied with a response.
Example Prompt Template Library
This library of example prompt templates gives you a starting point for creating your own custom prompt templates.
How Users Work with a Prompt Template
As a Salesforce administrator, you configure prompt templates to make tasks easier for your users. This section explains how your users can apply these prompt templates to write emails, generate case summaries, complete text form fields, and more.
